# Session Information

Session information updated 2.10.2023.

## Basic Session Information

```{r}
#| label: session-info

sesh_info <- sessionInfo()
sesh_info$R.version$quarto <- paste(
  system("quarto -V", intern = TRUE)[1],
  "@",
  quarto::quarto_path()
)

print(sesh_info, RNG = TRUE)
sesh_info$R.version
```

## Diagnostics for `renv`

```{r}
#| label: renv-info

renv::diagnostics()

```
